reason:
NODE REFERENCES 1.4.3 BUT HAS NO DECLARED DEPENDENCY:

The r -> infinity section explicitly references 'the SUSY obstruction (1.4.3)' as a dependency of its argument. This creates a logical dependency on node 1.4.3, yet no dependency is declared. If node 1.4.3's claims are revised (as they should be, given the critical SUSY error), the r -> infinity discussion would need updating.

The node should either:
(a) Declare node 1.4.3 as a dependency, or
(b) Be self-contained by stating the relevant facts from 1.4.3 directly (which would then be subject to the same corrections needed for 1.4.3 itself).

Additionally, the node references 'Part I (q=1 BLM model)' for the fixed-j limit but does not specify which node this corresponds to (presumably 1.1 or 1.2). These implicit dependencies should be made explicit.
